summary: Action required: update cluster proxy configuration
description: The clusterwide openshift proxy is misconfigured, generating alerts to Red Hat SRE. Please review it to restore the cluster's operation. See documentation: https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws_classic_architecture/4/html/ovn-kubernetes_network_plugin/configuring-a-cluster-wide-proxy.
